question_text_en: What is the shortest duration for an agent that reads an object which is a subclass of Props in the bedroom for less than or equal to 20 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (MIN(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:read .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration <= 20)
}

qualifiers_en.time: less than or equal to 20 seconds

qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Props
qualifiers_en.question: What is the shortest duration?

question_text_en: What is the total duration of the activity where an agent brushes an object whose type is Toothbrush in the bathroom from 2024-04-09T05:36:00 to 2024-06-30T23:08:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:brush .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a vh2kg:Toothbrush .
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "bathroom" .
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-09T05:36:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-30T23:08:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .

question_text_en: What is the total duration of the action performed by an agent that wipes an object which is a subclass of Props at a position where the X coordinate is less than 6.55 for more than or equal to 3 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
FILTER("6.55"^^xsd:double > ?pos_x)
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration >= 3)
}

question_text_en: How many times does an agent switch off an object whose state is ON in the bedroom in less than 8 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?event) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOff .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:ON .
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration < 8)
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
}

question_text_en: What is the longest duration involving an agent that scrubs an object whose state is GRABED at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -3.81 for more than 1 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (MAX(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
FILTER("-3.81"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration > 1)
}

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (MIN(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a vh2kg:Wineglass .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-13T20:31:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-08T16:50:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
}

question_text_en: What is the average duration of an agent putting in an object which is a subclass of Potato_1 in the kitchen for less than or equal to 5 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (AVG(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:putIn .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Potato_1 .
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration <= 5)
}

question_text_en: What is the total duration for which an agent drinks an object whose width is greater than 0.09m in the livingroom from 2024-05-08T05:07:00 to 2024-06-28T06:42:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:drink .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:first ?size_x .
filter(?size_x > 0.09)
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-05-08T05:07:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-28T06:42:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
}

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

?event vh2kg:action ac:brush .

?object a vh2kg:Toothbrush .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
FILTER("-10.84"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .

}

question_text_en: What is the average Z coordinate of an object whose type is Towel that is wiped by an agent in the bedroom for more than or equal to 5 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>

PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (AVG(?pos_z) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration >= 5)
} }
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a vh2kg:Towel .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
}

query:

FILTER("2024-05-02T14:34:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-15T00:06:00"^^xsd:dateTime)

query:

question_text_en: What is the total duration for an agent that opens an object whose height is greater than or equal to 0.56m in the kitchen for less than or equal to 13 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:open .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
filter(?size_y >= 0.56)
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration <= 13)
}

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOff .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_switch .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
FILTER("-3.1"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration >= 7)
}

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (MAX(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:type .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:first ?size_x .
filter(?size_x >= 0.16)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("2.47"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-06-15T07:48:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-19T06:59:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
}

question_text_en: What is the average X coordinate of an object whose state is GRABED put in by an agent at a position where the Z coordinate is less than 0.79 just before closing the microwave316?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (AVG(?pos_x) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:putIn .
{
select distinct * where {
?event vh2kg:nextEvent ?next_event .
?next_event vh2kg:action ac:close .
?next_event vh2kg:mainObject ?next_object .
?next_object rdfs:label "microwave" .
?event vh2kg:eventNumber ?event_number .
} order by desc(?event_number) limit 1
}
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
FILTER("0.79"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
}

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:eat .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:first ?size_x .
filter(?size_x <= 0.4)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .

?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .

FILTER(?duration > 6)
}

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?object (COUNT(distinct ?event) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:soak .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .

?event vh2kg:place ?place .

?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration >= 12)
} group by ?object

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (MAX(?pos_y) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:soak .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-06-03T21:36:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-07T11:46:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
FILTER("2.49"^^xsd:double > ?pos_x)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Potato_1 .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
}

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select distinct ?event where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:turnTo .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:CLEAN .
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-25T23:58:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-30T04:35:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
}

question_text_en: What is the average X coordinate of an object which is a subclass of Electronics that is turned to by an agent in the kitchen after 2024-05-06T18:31:00 and before or at 2024-06-19T23:04:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (AVG(?pos_x) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:turnTo .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-05-06T18:31:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-19T23:04:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
} }
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Electronics .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
}

question_text_en: How many times per object does an agent write on an object whose state is GRABED at a position where the X coordinate is greater than 1.59 in less than 14 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?object (COUNT(distinct ?event) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:write .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
FILTER("1.59"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration < 14)
} group by ?object

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>

question_text_en: How many times per object does an agent close an object whose height is less than or equal to 0.66m at a position where the Y coordinate is less than 1.86 for less than or equal to 15 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?object (COUNT(distinct ?event) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
filter(?size_y <= 0.66)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("1.86"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration <= 15)
} group by ?object

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOff .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:PLUGGED_IN .
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
FILTER("-3.09"^^xsd:double > ?pos_x)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?answer .
} limit 1

query:

question_text_en: What is the next activity involving an agent that puts in an object whose width is less than 0.69m at a position where the Y coordinate is greater than 0.59 before closing the fridge308?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:putIn .
{
select distinct * where {
?event vh2kg:nextEvent+ ?next_event .
?next_event vh2kg:action ac:close .
?next_event vh2kg:mainObject ?next_object .
?next_object rdfs:label "fridge" .
?event vh2kg:eventNumber ?event_number .
} order by desc(?event_number) limit 1
}
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:first ?size_x .
filter(?size_x < 0.69)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("0.59"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
?activity vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
?activity vh2kg:nextActivity ?answer .
} limit 1

question_text_en: What is the next activity involving an agent that pours an object whose state is GRABED at a position where the Y coordinate is less than 2.34 for less than or equal to 22 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration <= 22)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("2.34"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
?activity vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
?activity vh2kg:nextActivity ?answer .
} limit 1

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:put .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Food .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-05-15T04:01:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-02T08:46:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
}  }
?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
} limit 1

question_text_en: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of an object whose attribute is has_plug that an agent interacts with by text for more than 14 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:text .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_plug .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration > 14)
}  }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
} limit 1

query:

SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {

FILTER("2024-06-14T18:40:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-23T06:37:00"^^xsd:dateTime)

question_text_en: What is the place where an agent lastly squeezes an object whose height is less than 0.26m?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:squeeze .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
filter(?size_y < 0.26)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
} order by desc(?end_time) }
?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
} limit 1

question_text_en: What are the start and end frames of the scene from camera3 involving an agent that pours an object which is a subclass of Alcohol_1 at a position where the Y coordinate is greater than 1.0 for less than or equal to 17 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
{
SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
WHERE {
{ SELECT * WHERE {
?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration <= 17)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Alcohol_1 .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("1.0"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
} }
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera3_scene1 .
?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
} GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
}
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
} limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera2 involving an agent that wipes an object whose state is GRABED at a position where the Y coordinate is less than 1.93 for more than 4 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration > 4)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("1.93"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 ;
vh2kg:video ?answer .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?visible_object ?pos2d WHERE {
{
SELECT ?vs (Min(?num) AS ?minNum)
WHERE {
{ SELECT * WHERE {
?event vh2kg:action ac:find .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-05-21T08:50:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-29T15:30:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a vh2kg:Tvstand .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
FILTER("-8.18"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
} }
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 .
?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
} GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
}
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?bbox .
?bbox a mssn:BoundingBoxDescriptor ;
vh2kg:bbox-2d-value ?pos2d ;
vh2kg:is2DbboxOf ?visible_object .
}

query:

SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOff .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration < 15)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:OPEN .

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
{
SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
WHERE {
{ SELECT * WHERE {
?event vh2kg:action ac:read .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-05T02:58:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-20T18:42:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a vh2kg:Book .
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
} }
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera0_scene1 .
?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
} GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
}
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>

{
SELECT ?vs (Min(?num) AS ?minNum)
WHERE {

?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>

PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:soak .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-05-11T21:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-21T16:28:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Carrot_1 .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
FILTER("0.94"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 ;
vh2kg:video ?answer .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
{
SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
WHERE {
{ SELECT * WHERE {
?event vh2kg:action ac:rinse .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration > 2)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:clothes .
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "bathroom" .
} }
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 .
?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
} GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
}
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:text .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-07T22:12:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-07-06T05:32:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:first ?size_x .
filter(?size_x <= 0.22)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("0.7"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera0_scene1 ;
vh2kg:video ?answer .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
{
SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
WHERE {
{ SELECT * WHERE {
?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOn .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-01T10:08:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-04T19:36:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:OFF .
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
} }
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera0_scene1 .
?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
} GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
}
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?visible_object ?pos2d WHERE {
{
SELECT ?vs (Min(?num) AS ?minNum)
WHERE {
{ SELECT * WHERE {
?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-05-06T02:27:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-07T09:15:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("1.22"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
} }
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 .
?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
} GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
}
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?bbox .
?bbox a mssn:BoundingBoxDescriptor ;
vh2kg:bbox-2d-value ?pos2d ;

}

question_text_en: What are the start and end frames of the scene from camera2 involving an agent that rinses an object which is a subclass of Props in the bathroom for more than 15 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
{
SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
WHERE {
{ SELECT * WHERE {
?event vh2kg:action ac:rinse .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration > 15)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "bathroom" .
} }
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 .
?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
} GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
}
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-06-10T03:29:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-28T07:07:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:cream .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
FILTER("-8.69"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 ;
vh2kg:video ?answer .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?visible_object ?pos2d WHERE {
{
SELECT ?vs (Max(?num) AS ?maxNum)
WHERE {
{ SELECT * WHERE {
?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-06-26T12:14:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-07-09T00:21:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:cover_object .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("0.32"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
} }
?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 .
?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
} GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
}
?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum ;
mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?bbox .
?bbox a mssn:BoundingBoxDescriptor ;
vh2kg:bbox-2d-value ?pos2d ;
vh2kg:is2DbboxOf ?visible_object .
}

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:DIRTY .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration < 7)
}  }
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration > 14)
}  }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
FILTER("7.91"^^xsd:double > ?pos_x)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:state ?answer .
} limit 1

question_text_en: What is the superclass of the object that an agent shakes at a position where the Y coordinate is greater than 0.89 lastly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:shake .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
} order by desc(?end_time) }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("0.89"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object rdf:type ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf ?answer .
} limit 1

query:

PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>

FILTER("2024-05-10T18:52:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-07-07T01:01:00"^^xsd:dateTime)

?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .

FILTER("2.2"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;

question_text_en: What is the state of the object put in by an agent at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -5.49 lastly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:putIn .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
} order by desc(?end_time) }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
FILTER("-5.49"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:state ?answer .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:squeeze .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-05-28T11:47:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-08T17:22:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
}  }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .

?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
FILTER("1.83"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:state ?answer .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:squeeze .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration > 6)
}  }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
FILTER("3.34"^^xsd:double > ?pos_x)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object rdf:type ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf ?answer .
} limit 1

PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?size_x ?size_y ?size_z WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:shake .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
} order by asc(?begin_time) }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
FILTER("-4.03"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
} limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.space: at a position where the X coordinate is greater than -4.03
qualifiers_en.question: What are the width, height, and depth of the object?

paraphrased_question_text_en: What are the width, height, and depth of the object that an agent shook at a location where the X coordinate is greater than -4.03?

question_text_en: What is the type of the object poured by an agent at a position where the X coordinate is less than -0.3 for more than 9 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration > 9)
}  }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
FILTER("-0.3"^^xsd:double > ?pos_x)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object rdf:type ?answer .
} limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.space: at a position where the X coordinate is less than -0.3
qualifiers_en.question: What is the type of the object?

paraphrased_question_text_en: What type of object did the agent pour at a location where the X coordinate was less than -0.3 for more than 9 seconds?
